attributes.action: Turn the M25 into a moat and make London an independent state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Turn the M25 into a moat and make London an independent state once and for all.

Either that or spend some money on the rest of the coutry, perhaps building national arenas and other such things above the Watford Gap.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
